title: UPI Phishing Fraud – Ambala
summary: Victim lost ₹65,000 after clicking a fake UPI verification link.

stages.info:
Victim clicked link & entered OTP.
Money debited through UPI.
Reported within 1 hour.
stages.question: Immediate priority:
options: Freeze beneficiary account via bank nodal officer
Collect victim’s mobile for FSL first
Ask victim to reinstall UPI app
Wait for 24 hours to confirm fraud
stages.feedback_wrong: Immediate freezing often recovers partial funds.

stages.info: Mule wallet identified; KYC appears suspicious.
stages.question: Next step?
options: Request full wallet KYC + login IP logs from provider
Wait for wallet company to voluntarily contact you
Seize victim's SIM card immediately
Ask victim to arrange meeting with fraudster
stages.feedback_wrong: IP logs help trace device & location.
stages.next_info: IP traced to café in Rajpura.

stages.question: Your action?
options: Seize café CCTV + user register & examine time-matched logs
Seal café immediately without checking logs
Ask café owner to identify suspect from memory
Invite café owner to police station daily
stages.feedback_wrong: CCTV + user logs give hard evidence.
stages.next_info: CCTV shows male using terminal at 22:55.

stages.question: Next step?
options: Verify Aadhar-linked mobile & check for past cyber offences
Publish suspect's Aadhar on social media
Ignore Aadhar linkage
Depend only on CCTV frame
stages.feedback_wrong: Cross-checking linked number reveals patterns & past cases.
stages.next_info: Same number linked to 2 older frauds.

stages.info: Number linked to prior frauds in Ambala Cantt.
stages.question: Next action?
options: Coordinate with Cantt police & plan targeted raid
Wait for suspect to commit another fraud
Arrest café owner
Ask victim to keep calling suspect
stages.next_info: Raids lead to detention of primary operator.

stages.info:
Device seized from accused.
Contains phishing templates.
stages.question: Now?
options: Send device for digital forensic imaging & update banks
Allow suspect to format phone
Return device to victim
Skip forensic chain documentation
stages.feedback_wrong: Digital forensics + proper chain maintains evidentiary integrity.
